item.title: Lutron Caséta Wireless Smart Lighting Lamp Dimmer | PD-3PCL-WH
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) PEACE OF MIND: Set lights to automatically adjust with seasons so your family always comes back to a well-lit home; enable smart away to randomly turn your lights on/off to look like you’re home even if you’re away (Caséta Smart Hub, L-BDG2-WH, required)MOST CONNECTED: Caséta connects with more leading smart ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $44.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:13:17 UTC – Details)



PEACE OF MIND: Set lights to automatically adjust with seasons so your family always comes back to a well-lit home; enable smart away to randomly turn your lights on/off to look like you’re home even if you’re away (Caséta Smart Hub, L-BDG2-WH, required)
MOST CONNECTED: Caséta connects with more leading smart home devices – including Amazon Alexa, Apple HomeKit, the Google Assistant, Ring, Serena shades and Sonos – than any other smart lighting control brand (Caséta Smart Hub required)
CONTROL YOUR WAY: Caséta puts the smarts in the switch so you can control a variety of ways – via the free Lutron app, your voice or from the switch; schedule lights to change at set times or activate scenes with the touch of a button (Caséta Smart Hub required)
GET MORE, SPEND LESS: One Caséta smart switch can control many bulbs at once; make many bulbs smart, even your existing bulbs; get smart control of multiple styles of dimmable LED, incandescent and halogen bulbs
SMART CONTROL OF PLUG-IN LAMPS: Simply plugs into a standard outlet and can be used with up to 2 floor or table lamps
WIRELESS REMOTE CONTROL: For added convenience, use with wireless Pico remote (PJ2-3BRL-GXX-L01) to turn your lights on, off, or dim and brighten with the touch of a button from anywhere in the home
EASY 3-WAY SETUP: Create a 3-way by mounting Pico to almost any wall surface – no cutting holes or pulling wire, with a wall mount bracket (PICO-WBX-ADAPT sold separately). Replace existing 3-way switches by mounting the bracket and Pico over the backbox

4.5
Price: $44.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:13:17 UTC – Details)

Wide compatibility to cover all IOS devices, Compatible with iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $59.99 - $36.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:57:03 UTC – Details)



【Upgrade 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Station】Wireless Charging Station for Apple products,Saves your costs.Fast 3 in 1 charging station is equal to one charging station for iWatch, one Phone charging stand, 1 charging dock for AirPods. Wide compatibility to cover all IOS devices, Compatible with iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/13 mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 mini/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS/XR/XS MAX/X/8/8Plus & iWatch SE/6/5/4/3/2 & AirPods Pro/3/2/1. A must device for apple fans.
【Simplify Charging,Simplified Life】Only need one cable to charge for iphone, apple watch and airpods simultaneously, bring you an effortless charging experience, no more tangled cords trouble.Also, easy to find the “sweet spot” to charge, just simply place your phone on the stand and this wireless charger stand will do the rest. The Charging station for multiple devices apple is very suitable as a Christmas gift,Thanksgiving gift or birthday gift for friends.
【Intelligent Protection&Sleep Friendly Charging Pad】Our wireless charging stand with lightweight design, space saving,base with anti-slip silicone design so that the charger will not move or flip, to ensure that your phone is protected when charging; Besides, features a blue LED indicator when charging. If place this on nightstand, the blue light is a soft and not dazzing, virtually won’t lights up the entire room, no need to worry that it will prevent your sleep from being affected.
【What You Will Get】Our package includes 1* Wireless Charger iPhone,1*18W wall adapter,1*USB-C Charging Cable,1*User Manual,Worry-free 24-Month Warranty.One device allows you to have a clean desk and a beautiful smile,Please rest assured of the quality of our products that every product we send to you has gone through a series of quality inspection procedures. if you have any question on this wireless iphone charger, please contact us we will offer you a best solution within 24 hours.

item.title: UBeesize 67” Phone Tripod Stand & Selfie Stick Tripod, All in One Professional Cell Phone Tripod, Cellphone Tripod with Wireless Remote and Phone Holder, Compatible with All Phones/Cameras
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【Amazing Maximum Height to 67in】With a minimum storage space to 20in, easy to carry when traveling, hiking or camping. Fully Extendable to 67in, allowing you to take photos of the whole family and capture the best moments.【Selfie Stick Tripod & Phone Tripod Stand】Switch freely between selfie stick mode and tripod ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.30 - $13.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:31:23 UTC – Details)



【Amazing Maximum Height to 67in】With a minimum storage space to 20in, easy to carry when traveling, hiking or camping. Fully Extendable to 67in, allowing you to take photos of the whole family and capture the best moments.
【Selfie Stick Tripod & Phone Tripod Stand】Switch freely between selfie stick mode and tripod stand mode. The tripod is applicable to any situation such as video shooting, group photos, vlogging, adventuring, and taking selfies. Plus, it works in landscape or portrait mode.
【Strong and Sturdy】Made of highly-durable aluminum-alloy material with stainless steel, ABS plastic, designed with base locking knob in the center to prevent tilting or wobbling. The most frequent issues occur at other selfie stick tripods are solved by our 67” tripod.
【Everything you Need in One Box】Supplied with both a phone holder for mobile phones and BC parts for Go pro as well as a Wireless Remote for long-distance control, this is the complete solution for the Content Creator. A do-everything, go-anywhere kit that’s been put together for today’s influencer and content creator: Youtuber, Instagrammer, Tiktoker, etc.
【Wide Compatibility】Universal phone Holder fits most smartphones with or without a case, compatible with Galaxy S9/S9 Plus/Note 8/S8/S8 Plus/S7 Edge/J7, Samsung, Huawei. With a universal 1/4 inch screw, it fits for the DSLR, SLR, action camera, webcam, camcorder.
【Perfect After-sale Service】UBeesize provides 24-month replacement service and lifetime friendly after-sales service. Any questions, feel free to contact our customer service staff.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 07:31:23 UTC – Details)

This Dell OptiPlex 9020 desktop computer won’t take up much space on your desktop, yet it still contains powerful hardware to keep you productive, including a fast processor for multitasking and a variety of ports for connecting peripherals.

Specifications: Processor: Intel Core i7 4770 3.4GHz Graphics: Integrated Intel HD Memory: 32GB DDR3 Hard Drive: 1TB SSDOperating System: Windows 10 Pro 64 Bit – Multi-language supports English/Spanish/FrenchPorts: 4 External USB 3.0 ports (2 front, 2 rear) and 6 External USB 2.0 ports (2 front, 4 rear); 1 RJ-45; 1 Serial; 1 VGA; 2 DisplayPort; 2 PS/2; 2 Line-in (stereo/microphone), 2 Line-out (headphone/speaker)Included in the box Computer; Power Cord; USB Keyboard; USB Mouse.

POWERFUL PROCESSOR – Configured with top of the line series processor for lightning fast, reliable and consistent performance to ensure an exceptional PC experience.
SUPERIOR STORAGE AND MEMORY – Customized with 1TB SSD storage space to store apps, games, photos, music and movies. Loaded with DELLGB of RAM to zip through multiple tasks in a hurry without lag.
WiFi CONNECTIVITY – Stay connected to the WiFi Adapter. Play your favorite music files with stereo sound. Easily connect to large and multiple monitors through the installed onboard video connections.
WINDOWS 10 LATEST RELEASE – A new installation of the latest Microsoft Windows 10 Professional 64 Bit Operating System software, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s latest and best OS to date, Windows 10 Professional 64 Bit will maximize the utility of each PC for years to come. Optional software such as Anti-Virus and Office 365 can also be easily downloaded through the Microsoft Windows App Store.
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE – All Amazon Renewed computers come with a 90-day warranty and technical support to provide customers with unmatched quality and care.

item.content:encoded:

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:37 UTC – Details)



8″ HD display, 2X the storage (32 or 64 GB of internal storage and up to 1 TB with microSD card) + 3 GB RAM.
All-day battery life & wireless charging in less than 3 hours with charging dock – Up to 12 hours of reading, browsing the web, watching videos, and listening to music.
Wireless charging dock eliminates the need to plug in your Fire HD 8 Plus every time you want to charge it. The dock is always ready. Just drop your tablet in the dock and let it charge.
30% faster thanks to the new 2.0 GHz quad-core processor.
Enjoy your favorite apps like Netflix, Facebook, Hulu, Instagram, TikTok, and more through Amazon’s Appstore (Google Play not supported), plus 6 months free of Kindle Unlimited (you’ll receive the offer via email upon device activation).
Transform your tablet into an immersive, full-screen Alexa experience, optimized for visibility across the room. Just ask Alexa to show news, check the weather, view camera feeds, make a video call, set alarms, or play your favorite video and music, and much more.
Dock your Fire HD 8 Plus tablet in either portrait or landscape mode, and the cradle helps guide your tablet to ensure proper alignment

Jensen JE1913ACWM Widescreen 19″ Wallmount LCD 100-240V AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc.
JENSEN…the ONLY Brand of TVs designed, engineered, tested & built exclusively for Over-The-Road Applications.
Enjoy functionality at its best with the JE1913AC. This Flat Panel JENSEN LCD TV boasts all the features you could ask for including an integrated HDTV tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p), 16:9 aspect ratio and high-contrast ratio. Brings home entertainment to the RV and take a quality entertainment experience wherever you go! Mount it on the Wall with a VESA 100mm x 100mm mounting pattern TV Mount. To round out this extensive feature set, the JE1913AC features various inputs and outputs.
Inputs/Outputs

  • Composite video input x 2 (NTSC/PAL)
  • Stereo audio input x 1
  • VGA with 3.5mm audio input x1
  • USB input x 1
  • RF x 1
  • HDMI input x 2
  • Selectable (variable/fixed) line level audio output (RCA) x1
  • IR output
  • SPDIF output
  • Headphone output


Specifications

  • Power System: AC 100-240V, 50/60Hz
  • Power Consumption: 42mA stand by, 2.7A max
  • Operating Temperature Range: -4°F to 149°F -20°C to 65°C
  • Storage Temperature Range: -22°F to 158°F -30°C to 70°C
  • Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
  • Overall Dimensions: 18.03″ W x 12.08″ H x 2.06″ D
  • Product Weight:11 lbs
  • Regulatory Certification(s): FCC


Performance

  • Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
  • Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
  • Audio Output: 6W x 2


LCD

  • Diagonal Size: 19″
  • Resolution: 1366 x 768
  • Brightness: 250 nit
  • Contrast Ratio: 1000 : 1
  • View Angles: Top 85°, Bottom 85°, Left 80°, Right 80°
  • Display Format: 16:9
  • Response Time: 3.5 ms

110V AC powered LCD AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc., White LED illumination, 1366 x 768 full HD, Integrated HDTV (ATSC) tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p)
CEC function with AWM975 or other Jensen CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players (DVD Player Not Included), VESA 100mm x 100mm and 200mm x 400mm mounting pattern, Optional table top stand (STDJE1913) sold separately, Full function wireless remote control included
Convenient front controls, Conformal coated circuit boards, Rugged metal cabinet, Reinforced cabinet structure and mounting points. V-O rated front and rear cabinet materials which meets maximum UL/CUL safety certifications
